title: Team Information
empty_slogan: This team is mysterious and left nothing behind...
edit_description: Modify your team slogan to let others know your style
empty_team: All administrators are in this team :)
transfer_description: Are you sure you want to transfer captain privileges to {{username}}? This action cannot be undone!
remove_description: Are you sure you want to remove {{username}} from the team?
danger_description: The following operations are irreversible! Please proceed with caution!
delete_description: Are you sure you want to disband team {{teamname}} ? This action will delete all team data and cannot be undone!
not_join_team: You have not joined a team yet
not_join_team_description: Please create or join a team first to view team information
